byline.contributor: Mariana Simões contributed reporting from Rio de Janeiro, and Paula Moura from São Paulo.

lead_paragraph: The former president, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, is by far the biggest figure to be ensnared in sweeping investigations that have rattled almost every level of government.

headline.print_headline: Brazilian Prosecutors Seek Arrest of Former President in Graft Inquiry
headline.main: Brazil Prosecutors Seek Arrest of ‘Lula,’ Former President, in Graft Case

snippet: The former president, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, is by far the biggest figure to be ensnared in sweeping investigations that have rattled almost every level of government.
abstract: Brazilian prosecutors are moving to arrest former Pres Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva after filing corruption charges against him; da Silva, who rose from poverty to president, is most prominent target so far of broad inquiry into government misconduct; critics say he betrayed left-wing movement he led, which swept new generation of politicians to power.
